body:
With that patch `make.bash` runs fine, but `run.bash` fails to find the go binary. `gomote run go/bin/go` suggests that it's in fact there. Should PATH have been set by gomote somehow? Or do I need to set it manually in my invocation?

    s@instance-1:~$ gomote -project airy-shuttle run linux-arm-qemu go/src/run.bash
    /tmp/buildlet-scatch703261494/go/src/run.bash: line 8: go: command not found
    ##### Building packages and commands.
    /tmp/buildlet-scatch703261494/go/src/run.bash: line 41: go: command not found
    Error running run: exit status 127
